forum.content:
Hi,this is Vito.
I've been studying at the University of Melbourne in Australia for about 2.5 years.
After I came back to Taiwan, I found my language skill is losing, that's really scaring. In Taiwan, if I type English, they might think "are you showing off".
that's why I am here to ask for one who wanna talk or type english (prefer talk)

You are more than welcome to add me as your friend to practice together,
no need to care about your gender ,age,looking , or even your English level. Let's do it ~~~
forum.title: (Discussion) Good day, mate! let's talk in english
